remarks.format: ## Remarks 必要引數，這些引數是設計階段顯示之驗證錯誤中的未繫結程序結果。Required arguments that are unbound result in validation errors that are displayed at design time. 設定為`true`如果套用至引數。The is set to `true` if the is applied to an argument. 多載群組可以在通過 的引數上設定。Overload groups can be set on arguments through the .

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示 是否需要與值繫結。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is required to be bound to a value.

value.span: 如果 需要與值繫結，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the is required to be bound to a value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要一個不與值繫結的引數，則當包含的活動已準備就緒可以執行時，會擲回 ，除非使用多載群組並繫結多載群組的必要引數。If an argument is required and not bound to a value a is thrown when the containing activity is prepared for execution, unless overload groups are used and the required arguments of an overload group are bound. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 取得這個 所屬的多載群組清單。

span.span: Gets a list of the overload groups that this belongs to.
A list of overload group names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引數可以群組在一起以構成有效的多載群組。Arguments can be grouped together to form valid overload groups. 會識別此引數屬於哪些多載群組。 identifies the overload groups to which this argument belongs. 多載群組不得為其他多載群組的子集或對等的多載群組。An overload group cannot be a subset or an equivalent set of another overload group. 這個規則唯一的例外是只包含引數的子集，其中 為 `false`。The only exception to this rule is a subset that contains only arguments where is `false`. 多載群組可以重疊，但是如果群組交集範圍內包含一個或兩個多載群組所需的全部引數，則會是錯誤。Overload groups can overlap but it is an error if the intersection of the groups contains all the required arguments of one or both the overload groups. 如果群組中所有的 引數已繫結，則將多載群組視為已繫結。An overload group is considered bound if all the arguments in the group are bound. 如果群組沒有任何 引數，而且至少有一個引數已繫結，則將群組視為已繫結。If a group has zero arguments and at least one argument bound, then the group is considered bound. 如果沒有群組已繫結，則表示這是錯誤，除非有一個多載群組之中未包含任何 引數。It is an error if none of the groups are bound unless one overload group has no arguments in it. 不允許從多個多載群組繫結 引數。Binding arguments from more than one overload group is not permitted. 繫結多個多載群組 (也就是說，一個多載群組中所需的所有引數皆已繫結，而且其他多載群組中所有引數也已繫結) 是錯誤的。It is an error to have more than one overload group bound, that is, all required arguments in one overload group are bound and any argument in another overload group is also bound. 當包含的活動已準備就緒可以執行時，若違反上述任何規則，將導致擲回 。Any violation of the preceding rules results in a being thrown when the containing activity is prepared for execution. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
